abstract: Facebook is taking a rudimentary step down the path to becoming a public company, creating a dual-class stock structure for itself.
snippet: Facebook is taking a rudimentary step down the path to becoming a public company, creating a dual-class stock structure for itself.
lead_paragraph: Facebook is taking a rudimentary step down the path to becoming a public company, The New York Times’s Brad Stone reports from San Francisco.

headline.main: In Stock Shift, Facebook Lays Ground for I.P.O.
